definition: bow string/string of musical instrument/watchspring/chord (segment of curve)/hypotenuse/CL:根[gen1]
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: Another hallmark of string theory is the positing of additional dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 弦論另一個標誌是額外的維度。
